|brand = Buffalo |model = WSR-1166D |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |revision = HP |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 17, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Buffalo_WSR-1166DHP |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = FDI000000028 |icid = 6102A-062 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 141911520000J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12835F; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = 1600 |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB64M16FP-DH; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = CC:E1:D5 |oui = CC:E1:D5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = high power |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY65534-11;;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-21;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Buffalo-A-XXXX, Buffalo-G-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Buffalo-A-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$,,, ^Buffalo-G-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$, |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9115A |manuf_rev = AC22 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, Padavan (unofficially)
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/13/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA98C3RH8378 |asin = B00NGOMWDA |asin_country = JP |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603EN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141911520000J R01" and "RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the images (OEM: [[Arcadyan]]).
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-116#4133 On '''iXBT''' forums] (''Padavan'') • [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61988-53#2043 Spec.] :Buffalo WSR-1166DHP (HP=''High Power'') :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz [[MIPS32|MIPS 1004Kc]] :QDMA (16x), CryptoEngine, USB 3.0, NAND, SPI, SDXC :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12835F 16MB (SPI) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CB64M16FP-DH 128MB (DDR3-1600) :2.4GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E, [[Skyworks]] SKY65534-11 :5GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7612E, [[Skyworks]] SKY85712-21

===Devices=== :[[Buffalo]] • [[List of Buffalo Devices - Wireless Routers]] *[[Buffalo WSR-1166DHP]] - 2.4GHz/11bgn, 5GHz/11ac (17.2W) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz Dual-core (rev 0103) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: 128MB (DDR3) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E, [[MediaTek]] MT7612E *''Buffalo WSR-1166DD'' • FCC ID: FDI000000028 *[[Buffalo WSR-600DHP]] - 2.4GHz/11bgn, 5GHz/11an (10.5W) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621S @880MHz Single-core (rev 0103) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E, [[Ralink]] RT5592EP
*[[Buffalo WXR-1900DHP]] (27.8W) *[[Buffalo WZR-1750DHP]] (18.2W) :[http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00PU5LFF4 WZR-S1750DHP] (18.2W) :[http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00JWFB6CK WZR-1750DHP2/N] (18.2W) *[[Buffalo WZR-1166DHP]] (15.1W) :[http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00GY0BV76 WZR-1166DHP2] (15.1W) *[[Buffalo WHR-1166D]] (HP) (10.8W) :[http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00GYKG3Q0 WHR-600D/N] (8.2W)
